meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unacceptable.
meanings.sent1: The unacceptabilities of his behavior were evident to everyone.
meanings.sent2: She couldn't ignore the unacceptabilities of the situation any longer.
meanings.sent3: The unacceptabilities of the cake made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unacceptabilities of the proposal cast a shadow over the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The unacceptabilities of the noise were unbearable.

meanings.sent1: The teacher discussed the unacceptabilities found in the students' work.
meanings.sent2: They had to address the unacceptabilities in the contract before signing it.
meanings.sent3: The unacceptabilities in the movie plot were quite amusing.
meanings.sent4: The unacceptabilities in their behavior were like a red flag.
meanings.sent5: The unacceptabilities of the weather made the event challenging.
